## R Markdown Presentation & Plotly

```{r message = FALSE}
library(plotly)
```

I use the iris dataset to create a plot.
```{r load_data}
data("iris")
```

Plot sepal.length to petal.lenght and use species to select the color.
```{r eval = FALSE}
plot_ly(data = iris, x = iris$Sepal.Length, y = iris$Petal.Length, 
        color = iris$Species, mode = "markers", type = "scatter")
```

## Plot
```{r plot, echo = FALSE}
plot_ly(data = iris, x = iris$Sepal.Length, y = iris$Petal.Length, color = iris$Species, mode = "markers", type = "scatter")
```
